    • printInfo

      public void printInfo()

    • stopChefs

      public void stopChefs()
      Method for interrupting chefs threads. Method is called ONLY when the pizzeria is closing, So if the thread is waiting - it means it waits for a new order that's when we interrupt it If it's not waiting - that means it's running - we let him finish its job So we wait for this thread to finish - we call join().

    • stopCouriers

      public void stopCouriers()
      Method for interrupting couriers threads. Method is called ONLY when the pizzeria is closing, So if the thread is waiting - it means it waits for a new pizza to get cooked that's when we interrupt it If it's not waiting - that means it's running - we let him finish its job (deliver the rest) So we wait for this thread to finish - we call join().

    • isPizzeriaOpened

      public boolean isPizzeriaOpened()
      Simple method for checking a stop flag.
      Returns:
      boolean - true if the pizzeria is still opened

    • work

      public void work()
      "Main" method of pizzeria. It's where kitchen starting to cook, delivery to deliver and clients to order The method calls methods cook, deliver and order and then sleeps for workingTime ms. When it's awake - it calls stopChefs and stopCouriers Before calling it says that pizzeria is closing After calling it says that pizzeria is closed
